Hey all,

We’ve got a reseller offer for you! We provision these in both Telehouse NY and Digital Realty NY at random, the transit blends are Cogent/HE (Telehouse), and Telia/GTT/HE in Digital Realty.

Here’s what we’ve got for you:

## NY DA Reseller 1
1. 150GB Storage
2. 100 Account Limit (LES Exclusive: ticket for a bonus 300 to make 400)
3. Unlimited Email Accounts, Databases, Features
4. Litespeed Included
5. Softaculous Included
6. $7/month ($84/year) - https://console.geeksolutions.ca/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=10

Let us know if you have any questions!

Thanks for taking the time to read, now, enjoy the first month on the house. Coupon “ ITSONTHEHOUSE”.
